nodes.documentation:
PROBIT DIGITAL CURRENCY EXCHANGE
Website: https://www.probit.com
ProBit Exchange is built to be the most professional, global and secure marketplace for digital assets.
HOW PROBIT WILL BE DIFFERENT
ProBit seeks to distinguish itself from other exchanges proliferating the market
PROFESSIONAL
World Class trading engine providing fast and robust trading experience
GLOBAL
Global Coin-to-Coin exchange with presence in major financial markets
SECURED
NO.1 security through a wide array of options to secure digital assets
PROBIT TOKEN
PROB
PROB is a utility token native to ProBit Exchange. 
PROB provides benefits for traders including discounts and rights on the platform.
Name: ProbitExchange
Ticket: Prob 
Supply: 200,000 
Prices and Bonuses Listed Below: 
10 ETH = 4,000,000 + 40% Bonus
5 ETH = 2,000,000 + 30% Bonus
1 ETH = 400,000 + 25% Bonus
0.1 ETH = 40,000 + 15% Bonus
0.01 ETH = 4,000 (No Bonus)
nodes.name: Token
